title: Ultrafilter
summary: In the mathematical field of order theory, an ultrafilter on a given partially ordered set (or "poset") P {\displaystyle P} is a certain subset of P , {\displaystyle P,} namely a maximal filter on P ; {\displaystyle P;} that is, a proper filter on P {\displaystyle P} that cannot be enlarged to a bigger proper filter on P . {\displaystyle P.}
